title: Bitcoin Enters ‘Quiet Bull Market’ as Safe Haven from Bond Market Turmoil, Analyst Says
description: Investment research firm ByteTree upgraded bitcoin’s price outlook to “bull” from “neutral” as the crypto benefits as a “safe haven” amid an equity and bond sell-off.

title: Former FTX Developer Testifies on $8B Crypto Exchange Deficit in SBF Trial
description: In a pivotal development on the third day of the criminal trial for Sam “SBF” Bankman-Fried, the former CEO of crypto exchange FTX, his roommate from MIT, and former FTX developer, Adam Yedidia, took the stand. Yedidia’s testimony shed light on the alleged $8 billion deficit that FTX reported before its bankruptcy, with a focus ... Read more

title: Doge Meme Icon to Receive Honorary Statue in Japan
description: In a heartwarming tribute to the beloved canine that inspired the iconic Dogecoin meme, a community of NFT enthusiasts, known as PleasrDAO, has unveiled plans to erect a statue of Kabosu in Japan. Kabosu, the adorable Shiba Inu behind the viral Dogecoin meme, captured the hearts of millions with her endearing expression and became the ... Read more

title: Bitget Study reveals demographic for crypto users’ goals and behaviors
description: A recent survey by Bitget delves into the diverse motivations behind cryptocurrency investments across various countries, revealing insights into regional preferences and economic aspirations.

title: Sui Foundation repurposes 117 million tokens for community development
description: The Sui Foundation reallocates 117 million SUI Tokens from external market makers to accelerate ecosystem development and support growth initiatives, including decentralized applications and liquid staking protocols.

title: Massive Adoption Wave: Bitcoin Miners Can Pay Bills with Ripple’s (XRP) and Shiba Inu’s SHIB in Billion-Dollar Market
description: Through FCF Pay, Bitcoin miners can now offset their Bills through SHIB and XRP. The payment processor is broadening accessibility to these coins with its growing partnerships. Canada-based payment platform FCF Pay now supports the payment of utility bills with a range of cryptocurrencies including Ripple-associated XRP and Shiba Inu (SHIB). Moving forward, Bitcoin (BTC) [...]
